message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this valuable product. I think it would be perfect for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth significantly more than my asking price. To start the conversation, I'm proposing a price of $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I believe the value of this product is closer to my initial offer.  Would you consider $13,750?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I'm willing to pay $13,500 for it.
